source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have kept you waiting overlong, I fear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'espère que vous n'avez pas attendu trop longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000020_KRILE<tab>Not to worry, Alphinaud. We had some rather fine mulled wine to keep us company. Truth be told, you could have delayed your arrival a few moments more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000020_KRILE<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, Alphi. Nous en avons profité pour savourer le délicieux vin épicé du maître de cet éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000030_TATARU<tab>Gibrillont got the spicing just right this time. His latest batch is not only delicious and warming, but <var 1A 02 /var>soothing to the humours<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000030_TATARU<tab>Oh, oui<var 1D /var>! La recette de monsieur Gibrillont a des vertus thérapeutiques ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelles. Quelques gorgées de ce nectar et vous voilà paré pour le rude hiver du Coerthas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000040_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. But 'twas not to soothe our humours that we gathered here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000040_YSHTOLA<tab>Je suis tout à fait d'accord avec toi, Tataru. J'aimerais poursuivre cette discussion œnologique, mais je crois que nous avons un sujet plus important à aborder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000050_KRILE<tab>Ah, no─quite right. The matter of that poor dragoon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000050_KRILE<tab>En effet. Si nous vous avons fait venir ici, c'est avant tout pour parler d'Estinien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000060_ALPHINAUD<tab>You have discovered something─a means to save him?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Auriez-vous découvert quelque chose à son sujet<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000070_KRILE<tab>Let us not jump to conclusions, shall we? Assess the facts presented, then make an educated analysis, as you were taught.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000070_KRILE<tab>Du calme, du calme... Commençons par faire le point sur ce que nous savons déjà.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000080_YSHTOLA<tab>Pray cast your mind back to the moment of Estinien's transformation. Do you recall how you described it to us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000080_YSHTOLA<tab>Te rappelles-tu de ce que tu nous as raconté sur les événements survenus à Azys Lla, après le combat contre l'Archevêque<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000090_YSHTOLA<tab>You spoke of the sudden pangs which racked his body when he took up both of Nidhogg's eyes─and of how his form was twisted thereafter into a shadowy semblance of the great wyrm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000090_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu as vu Estinien être enveloppé par l'aura de Nidhogg puis prendre son apparence lorsqu'il s'est emparé du second Œil, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>When he appeared at Falcon's Nest, the wyrm's eyes were fused to his mail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quand il a fait son apparition au Nid du faucon, j'ai aperçu quelque chose incrusté dans son armure. Ça ressemblait aux Yeux du dragon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000110_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that only his armor had been corrupted... Snaking forth from the eyes, I descried dark tendrils which entangled his very being. His aether has been all but smothered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000110_YSHTOLA<tab>J'ai bien peur que ce soit plus compliqué que ça. J'ai pour ma part ressenti comme un voile maléfique qui recouvrait quasiment tout l'éther d'Estinien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then he is lost to us forever?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu veux dire que Nidhogg aurait définitivement pris possession de lui<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000130_KRILE<tab>What did I just say about jumping to conclusions!? Y'shtola clearly stated “all but smothered.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000130_KRILE<tab>N'allons pas trop vite dans nos conclusions, mon petit Alphi. Y'shtola a utilisé le mot “quasiment” à dessein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000140_KRILE<tab>As I later discovered, her impression matched my own. Though Nidhogg's presence filled my mind's eye, beneath his seething aura, I sensed the merest hint of something else.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000140_KRILE<tab>Malgré l'agitation qui régnait, l'Écho m'a permis de percevoir quelque chose d'étrange dans l'aura de Nidhogg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000150_KRILE<tab>And after listening to Y'shtola's observations, I became more certain of my suspicion: that the “something else” I had sensed was, in fact, the trace of a different will, submerged in the sea of Nidhogg's rage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000150_KRILE<tab>En parler avec Y'shtola m'a convaincue qu'il s'agissait d'une autre conscience, piégée par la violente haine de l'ancien dragon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>You mean...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais alors...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes. 'Tis like that Estinien's spirit yet lingers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, tu as deviné, Alphinaud. L'âme d'Estinien continue d'exister.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can we not wrest him from Nidhogg's grasp, then!? Tear the eyes from the armor!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il devrait donc être possible de le sauver en extirpant les Yeux du dragon de sa cuirasse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000190_YSHTOLA<tab>We know not if that would serve to separate wyrm's soul from man's. None have ever attempted such a feat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000190_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est difficile à dire. Aucun d'entre nous n'a jamais été confronté à un cas pareil<var 1D /var>: un humain et un dragon dont les âmes habitent le même corps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Should it offer even the faintest hope of success, then by the gods, I shall be the first to try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Certes, mais je veux tout de même croire à cette possibilité. J'ai la ferme intention de sauver notre ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000210_KRILE<tab>Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000210_KRILE<tab>Alphi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000220_KRILE<tab>By all means, hold fast to your hope. But be mindful of the dangers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000220_KRILE<tab>Tu as raison. Il faut garder espoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000230_KRILE<tab>Even should you succeed in excising the eyes from the dragoon's mail, we have no way of knowing if your friend's soul would survive so violent a separation. And that is to say nothing of the possibility that his would-be savior might become Nidhogg's next host.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000230_KRILE<tab>Toutefois, en admettant que nous réussissions à libérer Estinien, rien ne nous garantit que son âme résistera au choc. Il est également possible que celui qui aura retiré les Yeux succombe à son tour à la volonté de l'ancien dragon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>But what other choice remains to us? Should the opportunity present itself, I will tear those foul orbs from Estinien's armor and trust in the resilience of his soul─even at the risk of mine own!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai bien conscience des risques, mais je n'hésiterai pas à les arracher de mes propres mains si l'occasion se présente<var 1D /var>! Et je suis certain que la force mentale du Dragon céleste se chargera du reste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000250_HONOROIT<tab>Ah! I've found you at last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000250_HONOROIT<tab>Ah, je vous ai trouvés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000260_HONOROIT<tab>A messenger of the Temple Knights came to the manor some few hours past. The lord commander humbly requests the company of the Warrior of Light and Master Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000260_HONOROIT<tab>Un messager des templiers est venu au manoir pour nous informer que sire Aymeric aimerait vous voir tous les deux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ser Aymeric would speak with us? Very well. Thank you, Honoroit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas-là, nous ferions mieux d'aller lui rendre visite tout de suite. Merci d'être venu nous transmettre ce message, Honoroit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000280_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem duty calls. Pray see to yours, and we shall return to ours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000280_YSHTOLA<tab>Krile et moi allons reprendre notre mission.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, Y'shtola, Krile. Your words have given me hope where there was none.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>D'accord. Je vous remercie toutes les deux pour les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions que vous nous avez fournies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come then. Ser Aymeric awaits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien, je vais me rendre au palais de l'ordre du Temple de ce pas. Rejoignez-moi dès que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000310_KRILE<tab>Alphinaud is allowing his feelings for this dragoon to cloud his thoughts. I worry he may do something rash. Keep an eye on him, would you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000310_KRILE<tab>Alphi a l'air assez nerveux. Je compte sur vous pour veiller sur lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000320_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>They think more of their friend's deliverance than their foe's defeat... But will history commend their fealty or condemn their folly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000320_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ils ont donc l'intention de sauver leur ami... Comment allez-vous réagir, mes enfants<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000330_EDMONT<tab>The conference held at Falcon's Nest was to be a celebration of the reconciliation 'twixt man and dragon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000330_EDMONT<tab>La cérémonie organisée au Nid du faucon devait marquer
la renaissance des liens d'amitié entre les humains et les dragons.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000340_EDMONT<tab>But the lingering shade of Nidhogg, clad in the flesh of the Azure Dragoon,
did mark the occasion by spilling the blood of his own kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000340_EDMONT<tab>Hélas, l'in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion du Dragon céleste contrôlé par le haineux Nidhogg
 avait teinté de sang ce qui devait être le début d'une nouvelle ère de paix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000350_EDMONT<tab>A timely atrocity to remind the children of Ishgard that the Dragonsong War was far from over...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000350_EDMONT<tab>Cet acte de violence avait rappelé aux Ishgardais que la fin
de la guerre millénaire n'était encore qu'un rêve fragile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000360_EDMONT<tab>And when fear gave way to fury, the call to arms rang out anew: “Death to Nidhogg! Death to Nidhogg!”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000360_EDMONT<tab>Galvanisés par le sentiment vindicatif qui avait suivi la terreur,
ils ne désiraient plus qu'une chose<var 1D /var>: abattre leur ennemi juré.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000370_AYMERIC<tab>My friends, I thank you for coming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000370_AYMERIC<tab>Merci d'être venus, mes amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>You have had news of Nidhogg?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avez-vous du nouveau au sujet de Nidhogg, Messire Aymeric<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000390_AYMERIC<tab>Alas, not. Our scouts range far and wide, but they have as yet found no trace of the great wyrm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000390_AYMERIC<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, non. Et ce n'est pas faute d'avoir fait tout notre possible pour retrouver sa trace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000400_LUCIA<tab>We dispatched an elite unit of dragoons to reconnoiter the Churning Mists, but even they returned empty-handed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000400_LUCIA<tab>Nous avons envoyé les meilleurs éléments des chevaliers dragon en recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce dans les hauteurs de Dravania, mais ils n'ont rien découvert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>A pity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000420_AYMERIC<tab>Fear not, Alphinaud─we shall see the wyrm again soon enough. His words at Falcon's Nest attest to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000420_AYMERIC<tab>Pour que Nidhogg choisisse de s'approcher autant de notre sainte Cité afin de nous déclarer la guerre, c'est que l'attaque est imminente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000430_AYMERIC<tab>Indeed, he is like to come sooner than we would wish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000430_AYMERIC<tab>Il est hors de question que nous le laissions mener la danse ainsi. Nous devons être prêts à contre-attaquer à tout moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000440_ALPHINAUD<tab>I assume Ishgard's defenses are being bolstered as we speak?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000440_ALPHINAUD<tab>S'il lance lui-même l'assaut sur Ishgard, il va falloir renforcer les défenses au plus vite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000450_AYMERIC<tab>With all haste. I mean to call upon every able-bodied warrior at our disposal, from the knights of the four houses to the men and women of the watch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000450_AYMERIC<tab>Oui, et pour cela, j'ai déjà mobilisé tous les chevaliers des grandes maisons et les membres de la milice dirigée par Hilda.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000460_AYMERIC<tab>But I did not summon you to discuss strategy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000460_AYMERIC<tab>Mais ce n'est pas pour cette raison que je vous ai fait appeler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000470_ALPHINAUD<tab>What then would you have of us, my lord?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'attendez-vous de nous exactement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000480_AYMERIC<tab>I will speak plain: now that Nidhogg is possessed of both of his eyes, no mortal force we can muster will repel him. That being the case, we must needs recruit an ally of equal strength...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000480_AYMERIC<tab>Nous aurons beau effectuer tous les préparatifs nécessaires et même plus encore, jamais nous ne ferons le poids face à Nidhogg, surtout maintenant qu'il a récupéré ses deux yeux. Il nous faut un pouvoir égal au sien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>You speak of Hraesvelgr!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ne me dites pas que vous comptez faire appel à Hraesvelgr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000500_AYMERIC<tab>I do. To whom else could we turn?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000500_AYMERIC<tab>Hélas, je ne vois pas d'autre solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>That he is Nidhogg's equal I do not deny. Nor can I name another. But convincing the reclusive creature to do battle with his own brood-brother will be... How shall I put this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce dragon jouit ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment du même pouvoir que Nidhogg, mais je crains qu'il ne soit pas enclin à nous aider...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000520_AYMERIC<tab>It will be no small undertaking, yes. Estinien's report was most particular about Hraesvelgr's unwillingness to involve himself in the affairs of men.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000520_AYMERIC<tab>Je le sais bien. Estinien m'avait expliqué que Hraesvelgr n'avait aucune intention de s'impliquer dans le conflit qui nous oppose à son frère et à ses sbires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000530_AYMERIC<tab>But much has changed since your visit to Sohm Al, and if there is even a chance that the dragon may be swayed, I <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> plead our case. Whatever price the dragon asks of me, I shall pay it─such was my oath to defend the people of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000530_AYMERIC<tab>Je veux toutefois explorer la moindre possibilité, si cela peut permettre d'éviter à mon peuple d'atroces souffrances.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000540_AYMERIC<tab>Come what may, my friends, the battle with Nidhogg will mark the end of my tenure as the acting head of church and state. Will you help me discharge this final duty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000540_AYMERIC<tab>Je compte faire de la bataille contre Nidhogg ma dernière mission en tant que suppléant de l'Archevêque. Et pour cela, je vais avoir besoin de votre soutien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will, my lord─though I fear our involvement offers no guarantee of success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je comprends. Dans ce cas, nous acceptons de vous conduire jusqu'au domaine du dragon sacré.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come, then─we will depart at your leisure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avec le clairon que nous ont donné les Mogs, nous pourrons cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment obtenir une audience.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000570_AYMERIC<tab>Thank you. Both of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000570_AYMERIC<tab>Je vous remercie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000580_AYMERIC<tab>The city is yours, First Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000580_AYMERIC<tab>Lucia, je te confie les affaires courantes de la Cité en mon absence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000590_LUCIA<tab>My lord. We shall pray for your swift return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000590_LUCIA<tab>À vos ordres<var 1D /var>! Faites bien attention à vous, Capitaine général...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000600_HRAESVELGR<tab>You dare summon me again, mortals?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000600_HRAESVELGR<tab>C'est donc vous qui m'appelez une fois de plus, humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Great Hraesvelgr, 'tis not lightly that we beg this audience. Pray hearken to our words, for they concern the future of man and dragon both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excusez-nous de vous importuner, Hraesvelgr, mais nous avons besoin de votre aide afin de préserver l'espoir de paix entre les hommes et les dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000620_AYMERIC<tab>Greetings, Hraesvelgr. I am Aymeric de Borel, acting ruler of the nation of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000620_AYMERIC<tab>Ô grand Hraesvelgr, je suis Aymeric de Borel et j'assure temporairement les fonctions de chef de la Cité d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000630_AYMERIC<tab>I am come before you to parley on behalf of my people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000630_AYMERIC<tab>Je suis venu vous présenter une requête au nom de mon peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000640_HRAESVELGR<tab>...To <var 1A 02 /var>parley<var 1A 01 /var>? Thinkest thou thy purpose unclear to me? Thou art come to beg mine aid in the battle against the shade of my brood-brother.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000640_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je devine tes intentions, mortel. Tu désires que je vous aide à affronter mon frère, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000650_AYMERIC<tab>You...foresaw mine intent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000650_AYMERIC<tab>Euh... Oui, c'est bien cela...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000660_HRAESVELGR<tab>I but read that which is writ plain in thine eyes. Would that thou had wit enough to scry the answer in mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000660_HRAESVELGR<tab>Dans ce cas, tu sais cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment quelle est ma réponse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000670_HRAESVELGR<tab>My beloved Shiva did once build a bridge 'twixt man and dragon─a bridge which thy treacherous forefathers saw fit to tear down, as thou well knowest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000670_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu n'ignores pas que c'est la trahison de tes ancêtres qui a détruit le lien que ma bien-aimée Shiva avait créé entre nos peuples.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000680_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thinkest thou Nidhogg was alone in despairing at the murder of our brood-sister? Thinkest thou mine own soul did not cry out for vengeance? Know then that upon that accursed day, my heart did wither in my breast, and thy kind become unto me the harbingers of despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000680_HRAESVELGR<tab>Crois-tu que Nidhogg soit le seul à avoir ressenti de la douleur et de la colère lorsque notre sœur Ratatosk a été massacrée<var 1D /var>? Comment pourrais-je avoir confiance en vous après ce crime odieux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000690_HRAESVELGR<tab>'Tis only Shiva's gentle dream that preventeth me from flying at Nidhogg's shoulder. Be grateful that I swore to abjure aggression ere I consumed her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000690_HRAESVELGR<tab>Si j'ai refusé de suivre l'exemple de mon frère et de me battre contre les tiens, ce n'est que par respect pour le souvenir de ma bien-aimée. Lorsque j'ai consommé sa chair, je lui ai promis de ne plus jamais tuer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000700_HRAESVELGR<tab>I permit my children to offer or deny thee aid as they see fit; to warn thy people of my brood-brother's coming. That thou wouldst dare ask more of me but affirmeth thine incurable arrogance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000700_HRAESVELGR<tab>J'ai déjà laissé mes enfants libres de vivre en paix avec vous, et je vous ai même avertis du retour de l'âme de Nidhogg. Me demander davantage ne serait pas sage, humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000710_ALPHINAUD<tab>We understand that in your despair at man's betrayal, you seek only the refuge of solitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous savons bien que vous avez décidé de vivre loin des humains depuis leur trahison.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000720_ALPHINAUD<tab>But despite your protestations of spent faith, do you not still nurture the smallest flame of hope?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais nous voulons croire que vous n'avez pas com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment perdu espoir en notre peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000730_HRAESVELGR<tab>Perceivest thou such light in the dusk of mine existence?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000730_HRAESVELGR<tab>Est-ce vraiment ce que vous pensez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>I do. If you claim I see falsely, then tell me: why did you consent to bear Ysayle upon your back?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si ce n'était pas le cas, pourquoi auriez-vous porté Ysayle jusqu'à Azys Lla<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000750_HRAESVELGR<tab>Ysayle... Piteous, deluded Ysayle. The child did lament her past sins, and sought to balance the scales with her remaining days. 'Twas her unquenchable passion, so alike to that of my beloved, which did spur me into flight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000750_HRAESVELGR<tab>Ysayle... Tu veux parler de cette jeune femme qui croyait en sa propre illusion<var 1D /var>? Si je l'ai aidée, c'est uniquement parce que j'avais été touché par son honnête désir de repentir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000760_HRAESVELGR<tab>And for mine own part, I would countenance no longer the hands of evil men to use my brood-brother's eye for ill.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000760_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je ne pouvais pas supporter non plus que des êtres malin<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nés utilisent un des yeux de mon frère pour leurs sombres desseins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000770_ALPHINAUD<tab>So you do distinguish between those who acknowledge and repent their sins, and those who perpetuate them. Interesting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Autrement dit, vous faites la différence entre ceux d'entre nous qui reconnaissent et regrettent leurs péchés, et ceux qui sont prêts à répéter les mêmes erreurs par orgueil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems to me that you have not, in fact, lost faith in mankind as a whole. Rather, you weigh our respective merits by how we allow the past to influence our future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'en déduis donc que vous n'avez pas encore abandonné tout espoir en nous et que vous nous jugez en fonction de notre façon de faire face au passé et à l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000790_HRAESVELGR<tab>Spare me thine idle sophistry. Even were there a mote of truth in thy reasoning, what of it? Wouldst thou have me slay mine own sibling to save a city of mortals?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000790_HRAESVELGR<tab>Épargne-moi tes sophismes, humain<var 1D /var>! En admettant que tu aies raison, pourquoi accepterais-je de tuer mon frère pour vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000800_AYMERIC<tab>Should we suffer ties of blood to bind our hands then? Nay. If the crime is one of unconscionable evil, we must needs condemn it─even should the transgressor be our closest kin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000800_AYMERIC<tab>Un lien de parenté est-il une excuse valable pour laisser un acte ignoble et immoral être commis<var 1D /var>? Per<var 16 /var>son<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, je suis convaincu du contraire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000810_AYMERIC<tab>When my father corrupted himself and his followers with the power of a primal, I beseeched the Warrior of Light to slay him─an act alike to patricide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000810_AYMERIC<tab>J'ai demandé <var 08 E905 ((à la)) ((au)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière de tuer mon père, parce qu'il était devenu une menace pour nous tous. Je me suis en quelque sorte rendu coupable de parricide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000820_AYMERIC<tab>That he did not die by my hand matters little─if anything, it heaps greater disgrace upon my name. But had my father not fallen, he would have drawn countless thousands into a holy war of hellish proportions─which I hold the greater crime. Thus did I order his execution, sparing the lives of my people and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000820_AYMERIC<tab>On peut même dire que j'ai été lâche de recourir à quelqu'un d'autre. Toutefois, sans cela, nombre de mes concitoyens auraient perdu la vie ou auraient été plongés dans une nouvelle guerre meurtrière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000830_AYMERIC<tab>Alas, your brother wyrm now prepares to murder those whom I sought to spare. What is more, he has taken my comrade's body for his own─but if I must slay my dearest friend to defeat my direst foe, I will not flinch from my duty!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000830_AYMERIC<tab>Désormais, c'est Nidhogg qui s'apprête à nous attaquer, et il a pris le contrôle du corps de notre ami. Le vaincre causera peut-être la mort d'Estinien, mais c'est un sacrifice que je suis prêt à faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000840_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou wouldst strike down thy friend and, by example of thy righteousness, persuade me to break mine oath and kill my kindred?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000840_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu serais capable de tuer ton ami pour sauver ton peuple<var 1D /var>? Et pour cette raison, tu voudrais que je brise ma promesse et ôte la vie à mon frère<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000850_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Heed me, my child. The servants of Hydaelyn envision a different outcome. They intend salvation not only for Ishgard, but for the doomed dragonslayer as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000850_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Écoute-moi, mon enfant. Tu te méprends sur les intentions <var 08 E905 ((de la)) ((du)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière et de ses compagnons. Ils souhaitent non seulement épargner les habitants de leur cité, mais aussi libérer le Dragon céleste du pouvoir qui le contrôle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000860_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Believest thou this shade to be Nidhogg returned? Is it not merely a manifestation of his vengeance─the shadow cast by thy brood-brother's rage? I would not command thee, but ponder well thy course lest it lead thee unto greater remorse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000860_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Peut-on vraiment dire que cette entité est encore celle de ton frère Nidhogg<var 1D /var>? Ne s'agit-il pas plutôt d'une incarnation de sa haine<var 1D /var>? Je te demande de bien réfléchir aux con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces avant de prendre ta décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_Q1_000_001<tab>Que voulez-vous dire à Hraesvelgr<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_001<tab>While this shade of vengeance remains, the future will ever be uncertain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_001<tab>La haine du dragon maléfique doit disparaître pour le bien de tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_002<tab>Help us save our companion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_002<tab>S'il vous plaît, aidez-nous à sauver Estinien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_003<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_A1_000_003<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000870_HRAESVELGR<tab>Nidhogg's transformation into rage incarnate is, in part, of mine own doing. I rendered unto him mine eye, and empowered his revenge thereby... But 'tis the purity of my brood-brother's wrath that lendeth him his all-surpassing might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000870_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je me suis rendu en partie responsable de ce qui est arrivé à mon frère lorsque je lui ai offert un de mes yeux, et donné ainsi les moyens de sa vengeance. Cette ombre qui prend sa forme est d'autant plus puissante qu'elle n'est que haine, pure et sans limites.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000880_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou wishest to rescue the dragoon from his fate along with all the rest? I do begin to see why Ysayle entrusted her hope unto thee. Thy purpose is pure. ...But so too is my brood-brother's wrath, and 'tis that which lendeth him his all-surpassing might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000880_HRAESVELGR<tab>Ta volonté de sauver ton ami, tout comme l'espoir qu'Ysayle a placé en toi, sont purs. Toutefois, cette ombre qui prend la forme de Nidhogg est d'autant plus puissante qu'elle n'est faite que d'une haine intense.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000890_HRAESVELGR<tab>What, no words for me, warrior? I take it thou art resolved to act whether I aid thee or no... Ha! I do admire thy determination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000890_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu sais t'exprimer sans prononcer un seul mot, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Bien que tu sois humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, tu es semblable à un dragon. Toutefois, cette ombre qui prend la forme de Nidhogg est d'autant plus puissante qu'elle n'est faite que d'une haine intense.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000900_HRAESVELGR<tab>Hast thou the strength of will to stand against so terrible a shadow, I wonder? 'Twould seem I must put thee and thy companions to the proof.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000900_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je vais vous mettre à l'épreuve... pour vérifier que toi et tes camarades avez bien la force d'affronter l'ombre de mon frère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000910_HRAESVELGR<tab>I shall await thee in the ruins wherein Ratatoskr once dwelled. Heed well the words of my children, and hasten thee to the place of thy trial!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000910_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je vous attendrai devant l'ancien antre de ma sœur Ratatosk. Mon enfant vous montrera le chemin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000920_HRAESVELGR<tab>Even bereft of an eye, my brood-brother was a fearsome foe indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000920_HRAESVELGR<tab>Je comprends mieux pourquoi tu as réussi à vaincre Nidhogg, même s'il n'avait qu'un seul œil lorsque vous vous êtes affrontés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000930_HRAESVELGR<tab>But having tasted thy strength firsthand, full well can I imagine how thou didst bring him low. The dread title of “Azure Dragoon” is no empty appellation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000930_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu m'as démontré ton in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble conviction, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Toi aussi, tu mérites bien le titre de Dragon céleste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000940_HRAESVELGR<tab>But having tasted thy strength firsthand, I do begin to see how thou didst bring him low. Hydaelyn chooseth Her servants well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000940_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu m'as démontré ton in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble conviction, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Tu es un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> allié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000950_HRAESVELGR<tab>Very well. I shall trust in the seed of man one last time. By thy deeds shall the flickering hope that lingereth yet within my heart be kindled anew...or extinguished forever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000950_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu as gagné. J'accepte de placer en toi le peu de foi que j'ai en ton espèce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000970_AYMERIC<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000970_AYMERIC<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000980_HRAESVELGR<tab>That you yet stand is ready proof of your determination, mortals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000980_HRAESVELGR<tab>Il semblerait que vous ayez tous démontré votre courage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000990_HRAESVELGR<tab>Let us fight as allies, then, and together banish my brood-brother's vengeful shade. On my oath, the wrath that once was Nidhogg shall meet its end!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_000990_HRAESVELGR<tab>Moi, Hraesvelgr le dragon sacré, j'accepte d'affronter l'ombre de mon frère à vos côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001000_HRAESVELGR<tab>This I swear on the memory of my beloved Shiva, and on the soul of lost Ysayle...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001000_HRAESVELGR<tab>Au nom de ma bien-aimée Shiva et d'Ysayle, je vous en fais le serment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our negotiations proved rather more strenuous than I had anticipated, but the results seem well worth the effort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eh bien, je dois avouer être soulagé que tout se soit bien passé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001020_AYMERIC<tab>The battle was indeed hard-won. Thank you, my friends─I would never have earned Hraesvelgr's cooperation had you not seen fit to grant me yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001020_AYMERIC<tab>Je tiens à vous remercier tous les deux. C'est entièrement grâce à vous que Hraesvelgr a accepté de nous aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001030_AYMERIC<tab>'Twas your stalwart heroism that moved the heart of the great wyrm at the last. Any gratitude I can offer is but poor reward for your continued service to Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001030_AYMERIC<tab>J'ignore si je pourrai jamais vous exprimer toute ma gratitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001040_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould seem our final reckoning with the dread wyrm is at hand. I only wish we had some inkling as to when he means to strike.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ne nous réjouissons pas trop vite. Le plus dur est encore à venir, et nous ne savons pas quand Nidhogg lancera son assaut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh gods!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quel était ce rugissement<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The cry heraldeth his coming. Nidhogg's shade hath taken wing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>C'était un de mes enfants... Nidhogg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001070_AYMERIC<tab>It has begun. We must away to Ishgard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001070_AYMERIC<tab>Aurait-il donné l'ordre d'attaquer à ses sbires<var 1D /var>? Nous devons retourner à la sainte Cité sans plus tarder<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001080_HRAESVELGR<tab>Know you, then, what this roar portendeth?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001080_HRAESVELGR<tab>L'heure de la bataille finale a sonné, humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001090_AYMERIC<tab>Aye. I must return to my city without delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001090_AYMERIC<tab>Nous devons prévenir nos gens pour qu'ils se préparent à l'attaque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001100_HRAESVELGR<tab>Then we shall lend you our wings. Let us meet with Nidhogg on the field of battle, and together bring an end to his wrathful song.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001100_HRAESVELGR<tab>Dans ce cas, vous feriez mieux de monter sur nos dos. Le temps est venu de chasser les démons de mon frère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001110_LUCIA<tab>Remember your training! We hold fast until the lord commander returns!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001110_LUCIA<tab>Tenez bon<var 1D /var>! Nous devons résister à leurs assauts jusqu'au retour du capitaine général<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001120_LUCIA<tab>Ugh... We must hold...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001120_LUCIA<tab>Quelle hargne<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001130_ARTOIREL<tab>Reinforcements!
By the Fury... That one is the size of Nidhogg!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001130_ARTOIREL<tab>D'autres dragons arrivent<var 1D /var>! Leurs renforts sont-ils donc infinis<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001140_LUCIA<tab>Lord Commander!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001140_LUCIA<tab>Messire Aymeric<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001150_ARTOIREL<tab>You are late, Warrior of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001150_ARTOIREL<tab>Je savais que nous pouvions compter sur vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001160_NIDHOGG<tab>Wherefore standest thou with these vermin, Brother?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001160_NIDHOGG<tab>Que fais-tu ici, Hraesvelgr<var 1D /var>? Ne me dis pas que tu as décidé de me trahir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001170_HRAESVELGR<tab>Abandon this war, shade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001170_HRAESVELGR<tab>Retourne d'où tu viens, Nidhogg... Ou plutôt, toi qui n'es plus que l'ombre de mon frère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001180_HRAESVELGR<tab>The suffering thou sowest serveth no end. The traitors' progeny have learned of their forefathers' betrayal, and seek now to make amends with our kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001180_HRAESVELGR<tab>Quel intérêt y a-t-il à poursuivre cette guerre futile<var 1D /var>? Les humains sont désormais conscients du crime qu'ont commis leurs ancêtres. Ils ne désirent rien d'autre que de renouer le dialogue avec notre race.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001190_HRAESVELGR<tab>Never shall our grief be assuaged nor our loss forgotten, but reconciliation may yet halt the spread of this plague of enmity. Forsake thy vengeance and be at peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001190_HRAESVELGR<tab>Bien sûr, rien ne pourra jamais calmer la douleur et la tristesse dans nos cœurs, mais nous pouvons empêcher un nouvel embrasement de haine entre nos peuples. N'est-il pas temps de mettre fin à la vengeance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001200_NIDHOGG<tab>What soft-headed ramblings are these? Thy dalliance with that vile maid hath robbed thee of thy wits! Mayhap her cloying perfume hath made thee forget the stench of our brood-sister's lifeblood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001200_NIDHOGG<tab>Comment oses-tu dire de telles absurdités, mon frère<var 1D /var>? J'aurais dû me douter que ta relation avec cette vile humaine ne pouvait que faire germer les graines de la trahison en toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001210_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou darest speak thus of my beloved!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001210_HRAESVELGR<tab>Ne profane pas le souvenir de ma bien-aimée Shiva<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001220_NIDHOGG<tab>Ah! So the flames of rage may yet be kindled! I feared thy heart's fire had long since gone out. But waste not thy fury on words, Brother─thou shalt have need of it for the battle!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001220_NIDHOGG<tab>Je suis soulagé de voir qu'il reste encore un peu de colère en toi, Hraesvelgr<var 1D /var>! Mais trêve de bavardages<var 1D /var>! Viens donc m'affronter, puisque c'est ce que tu désires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001230_HRAESVELGR<tab>Guh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001230_HRAESVELGR<tab>Argh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001240_NIDHOGG<tab>Thou art weak, Hraesvelgr─a slithering wyrm who fawneth on the vermin who should rightly be his prey. For a thousand years have I fought without cease─and thou didst think to prevail against me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001240_NIDHOGG<tab>Comme j'ai pitié de toi, mon frère... À force de t'acoquiner avec les humains, tu es devenu si faible<var 1D /var>! Mais tu n'es pas l'ennemi que j'affronte depuis mille ans<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001250_HRAESVELGR<tab>Glory not in thy victory, shade. The battle...is not yet won. My power─and my hope─have I entrusted to another...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001250_HRAESVELGR<tab>Tu n'as pas encore gagné. J'ai déjà légué ma force et mon espoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001260_NIDHOGG<tab>Thine eye! What hast thou done!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001260_NIDHOGG<tab>Où est ton autre œil, Hraesvelgr<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001270_NIDHOGG<tab>Fool! Thou wouldst trust a mortal with thy strength!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001270_NIDHOGG<tab>Tu l'as confié à cet<var 08 E905 ((te)) (()) /var> humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001280_NIDHOGG<tab>I know thee... 'Twas thou who didst intrude upon my lair and best the half of me. But now I am whole, and naught in creation shall deny me my vengeance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001280_NIDHOGG<tab>Je te reconnais... Oui, tu es <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> qui a vaincu mon enveloppe charnelle auparavant<var 1D /var>! L'heure de ma revanche a enfin sonné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001290_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Is this...to be...mine end?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001290_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)... Moi vaincu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001300_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Nay... I will not allow it... I am of the first brood... I am vengeance incarnate... I am Nidhogg!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001300_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Non... C'est impossible... Je suis l'un des sept dragons anciens... Je vais leur montrer le véritable pouvoir... de Nidhogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001310_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Thou shalt die by my hand!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001310_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Veules humains<var 1D /var>! Vous allez tous périr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001320_ESTINIEN<tab>This is not your hand, wyrm!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001320_ESTINIEN<tab>N'y compte pas, Nidhogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001330_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Thou...wilt...obey!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001330_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Tu essaies... de me résister<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001340_ESTINIEN<tab>I would ask one last favor of you, Warrior of Light... Finish me─now, while I have the beast subdued!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001340_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vous en supplie... Donnez-moi le coup de grâce... tant que je suis encore capable de le maîtriser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001350_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Gaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001350_ESTINIEN<tab>(-Nidhogg-)Gouargh<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Augh! Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ouaaaaargh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001380_ESTINIEN<tab>You waste your time. Kill me! It is the only way! Ending Nidhogg...will be my final duty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001380_ESTINIEN<tab>Imbéciles<var 1D /var>! Dépêchez-vous... de m'achever<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi... accomplir ma dernière mission... en tant que Dragon céleste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>No! You can't die like this! I won't let you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est hors de question<var 1D /var>! Nous ne perdrons pas un ami de plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Augh! Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ouuuaaaaargh<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mouôôôôh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001420_NIDHOGG<tab>Undone by mortal will. Whither now...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001420_NIDHOGG<tab>Comment des humains peuvent-ils avoir autant de force... autant de volonté<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001430_AYMERIC<tab>The eyes! Cast them into the abyss!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001430_AYMERIC<tab>Que les Yeux du dragon soient jetés au fin fond de la Mer de nuages et oubliés pour l'éternité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001440_AYMERIC<tab>He lives. Ah, Estinien, my ill-fated friend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001440_AYMERIC<tab>... Il respire<var 1D /var>! Que la Conquérante soit louée<var 1D /var>! Estinien, mon ami, tu as survécu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001450_AYMERIC<tab>Lucia! Summon the healers! I want them ready to receive him!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001450_AYMERIC<tab>Lucia, dis à nos médecins de se préparer à le soigner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001460_LUCIA<tab>At once, Lord Commander!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001460_LUCIA<tab>Tout de suite, Capitaine général<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001470_AYMERIC<tab>Allow me to do this much, at least...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001470_AYMERIC<tab>Non, laissez-moi m'en occuper seul, s'il vous plaît...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001480_HRAESVELGR<tab>The Horde have sensed the fall of their master, and scattered to the winds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001480_HRAESVELGR<tab>Les enfants de mon frère se replient. Ils ont senti que son âme avait disparu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001490_AYMERIC<tab>You have my gratitude, Hraesvelgr. Your deeds this day have saved a great many lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001490_AYMERIC<tab>Je ne saurais vous exprimer toute ma gratitude pour l'aide que vous nous avez apportée, ô grand Hraesvelgr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001500_HRAESVELGR<tab>Then our alliance hath served its purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001500_HRAESVELGR<tab>J'ai tenu ma promesse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001510_HRAESVELGR<tab>Thou didst wield the power I granted thee well. 'Twas thine own skill and not mine eye which earned thee victory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001510_HRAESVELGR<tab>Te voir utiliser le pouvoir de mon œil pour éliminer l'ombre de mon frère m'a im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001520_HRAESVELGR<tab>I wish thy companion a swift recovery. Fare you well, children of man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001520_HRAESVELGR<tab>J'espère que votre ami se remettra vite. Adieu, humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001530_ALPHINAUD<tab>The battle is won. We can do no more for Estinien now than bear him home and wish him well, even as Hraesvelgr did. The rest we must trust to the hands of the healers and the grace of the gods.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001530_ALPHINAUD<tab>La bataille est terminée. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à prier qu'Estinien se remette rapidement de cette épreuve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001540_EDMONT<tab>The heroes of the hour return!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001540_EDMONT<tab>Les Douze soient loués<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes sains et saufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001550_ALPHINAUD<tab>We but did our duty, my lord. It was the memories of fallen friends and not our heroism which saw us through at the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001550_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est avant tout grâce au courage et à la force <var 08 E905 ((de la)) ((du)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière que nous avons pu vaincre Nidhogg. Et aussi avec le soutien spirituel de nos amis disparus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001560_ARTOIREL<tab>I gave every onze of my strength, but mine efforts would have counted for naught had the Warrior of Light not arrived to challenge the great wyrm. As a sworn knight of Ishgard, I had hoped to do more for my city...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001560_ARTOIREL<tab>Je pense m'être bien battu, pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment assez pour faire honneur à ma qualité de chevalier ishgardais, mais bien sûr, tout le mérite de notre victoire revient à notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001570_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Well, we cannot <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> be heroes, dear brother. Let us put away our pride for a moment, and revel in the valiant deeds of our comrade! For your sterling service to Ishgard, we salute you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001570_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Tout le monde ne peut pas être un héros, après tout. Reconnaissons l'exploit qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a une nouvelle fois accompli pour sauver notre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001580_EMMANELLAIN<tab>And while we're on the subject of valiant deeds, I believe I myself have earned some small measure of recognition: under my watchful command, the ballistas of the outer ward struck down a veritable swarm of Dravanian invaders.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001580_EMMANELLAIN<tab>J'ose espérer que vous allez aussi me féliciter pour avoir commandé avec brio l'unité chargée de manier les balistes. Grâce à moi, les dragons tombaient comme des mouches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001590_HONOROIT<tab>My lord's command was certainly watchful. He bravely watched as the siege crews took aim, and continued to watch as countless wyverns met their end. Indeed, the ward's defenders proved so well drilled that my lord had little occasion to <var 1A 02 /var>stop<var 1A 01 /var> watching.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001590_HONOROIT<tab>Je ne suis pas sûr que l'on puisse qualifier de commandement le fait de s'époumoner à crier... Si un grand nombre de wyvernes ont succombé, c'est avant tout parce que les soldats étaient d'une précision remarquable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001600_EDMONT<tab>There will be time enough to determine who is most deserving of recognition later. Our friends are doubtless weary from their exertions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001600_EDMONT<tab>J'aurai sûrement l'occasion de vérifier les dires d'Emmanellain plus tard. Pour le moment, j'imagine que vous souhaitez souffler un peu, mes amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001610_EDMONT<tab>I had chambers prepared in expectation of your return. You are welcome to retire at your leisure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001610_EDMONT<tab>J'ai fait préparer des chambres pour vous. Reposez-vous aussi longtemps que vous le voudrez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001620_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am most grateful for your hospitality, my lord, but I believe I shall pay a visit to the Temple Knights' infirmary. Pray excuse me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001620_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est très attentionné et généreux de votre part, cher Comte. Mais avant de penser à me prélasser, j'aimerais me rendre au palais de l'ordre du Temple, si vous n'y voyez pas d'objection.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001630_EDMONT<tab>How Master Alphinaud has grown. The plight of his stricken brother-in-arms pains him more than his own hurts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001630_EDMONT<tab>Je ne peux qu'admirer votre dévouement pour votre ami, Messire Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001640_EDMONT<tab>...In which respect, he has come to resemble you, Warrior of Light. Go then─visit the Azure Dragoon, and grant him what comfort you may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001640_EDMONT<tab>Et je devine que notre <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> partage le même sentiment. Je vous en prie, allez rendre visite à Estinien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh... Estinien...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001650_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Estinien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001660_ESTINIEN<tab>Cease your mewling, boy. It grates my ears.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001660_ESTINIEN<tab>Arrêtez donc de pleurer comme une fillette. Vous me cassez les oreilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Forgive me. When I saw you awaken, I could not─ It was such a relief! We feared you might never wake up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pardonnez-moi. Je n'ai pas pu retenir des larmes de joie en constatant que vous alliez mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001680_AYMERIC<tab>Now, now, Estinien. If Master Alphinaud thought any less of you, you would still be Nidhogg's plaything─<var 1A 02 /var>or dead<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001680_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien<var 1D /var>! Un peu de courtoisie, que diable<var 1D /var>! Si nos deux amis n'avaient pas pris autant de risques, il est fort probable que vous ne seriez plus parmi nous aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001690_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye, aye. 'Twas but a jest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001690_ESTINIEN<tab>Cela ne fait pas l'ombre d'un doute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001700_ESTINIEN<tab>I thank you, Alphinaud...and you too, Warrior of Light. Quite how you managed to persuade Hraesvelgr to aid in his brood-brother's downfall, I cannot imagine─but full glad am I that you did. 'Tis an honor to share the mantle of Azure Dragoon with one such as you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001700_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vous suis très re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant de m'avoir sauvé. Mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, la manière dont tu as utilisé le pouvoir de Hraesvelgr pour terrasser Nidhogg fait honneur à ton titre de Dragon céleste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001710_ESTINIEN<tab>I thank you, Alphinaud...and you too, Warrior of Light. Quite how you managed to persuade Hraesvelgr to aid in his brood-brother's downfall, I cannot imagine─but full glad am I that you did. Yet again, you have achieved the impossible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001710_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vous suis très re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant de m'avoir sauvé. Mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, la manière dont tu as utilisé le pouvoir de Hraesvelgr pour terrasser Nidhogg a démontré une fois de plus la valeur <var 08 E905 ((de la)) ((du)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001720_AYMERIC<tab>I, for my part, owe you an apology. When last we met, I did willingly loose an arrow at your heart. Can you forgive me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001720_AYMERIC<tab>J'espère que vous me pardonnerez d'avoir osé tirer sur vous, malgré notre longue amitié...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>There is naught to forgive, Aymeric. You but acted in defense of Ishgard, as is your duty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>Épargnez-moi vos excuses, Aymeric. Vous n'avez fait qu'agir dans l'intérêt d'Ishgard et de ses habitants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001740_ESTINIEN<tab>Were you any less single-minded about it, I would not follow you into battle─nor trust you at my back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001740_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est justement parce que je vous sais capable d'analyser la situation dans son ensemble, et de prendre les décisions nécessaires avec sang-froid, que je n'ai jamais hésité à vous demander d'assurer mes arrières.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001750_ESTINIEN<tab>Besides, I had come to the selfsame conclusion─that I would have to perish for Nidhogg to be stopped. So let us dispense with the hand-wringing. I have heard enough mewling for one day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001750_ESTINIEN<tab>J'avais de toute façon l'intention de donner ma vie pour nous débarrasser de Nidhogg. Ne comptez donc pas sur moi pour jouer les sentimentaux comme un certain blanc-bec que je connais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je... Je ne vois pas du tout de qui vous voulez parler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001770_ESTINIEN<tab>The tendrils of Nidhogg's foul presence bound up every fiber of my being, usurping my senses, but I yet retained some trace of awareness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001770_ESTINIEN<tab>Bien que Nidhogg ait pris le contrôle de mon corps, j'ai continué d'être vaguement conscient pendant tout ce temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001780_ESTINIEN<tab>The wyrm's mind was as a vast and tumultuous sea. Endlessly its black waters churned, his grief and despair at Ratatoskr's murder never calming, never receding. And driven by this surging current came wave upon wave of unrelenting rancor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001780_ESTINIEN<tab>Cela m'a permis de comprendre ses sentiments, notamment la profonde détresse qu'a provoqué en lui le meurtre de sa sœur Ratatosk. Ils étaient si proches, quasiment liés l'un à l'autre... J'ai également ressenti la rancœur infinie qui brûlait au fond de lui...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001790_ESTINIEN<tab>It was the very image of my own heart. There I saw the dark reflection of the hatred I felt after Nidhogg slew my family, when no path remained save vengeance against dragonkind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001790_ESTINIEN<tab>C'était comme le reflet de ma propre haine. Je voyais en lui le même désir de vengeance que celui qui m'a conduit à chasser ses semblables après qu'il a massacré ma famille...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001800_ESTINIEN<tab>Neither one of us had a choice. But I was blessed with something Nidhogg was not─comrades and teachers to console and admonish me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001800_ESTINIEN<tab>Il y avait toutefois une importante différence entre nous. Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment à lui, j'ai eu un maître, des amis et des frères d'armes. Ils ont tous su me soutenir, me montrer la voie et parfois même me faire des remontrances...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001810_ESTINIEN<tab>Had I not had them to gainsay my obsession, it would surely have consumed me, as Nidhogg's did him, and we would have been in all respects alike.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001810_ESTINIEN<tab>Nidhogg, lui, n'avait personne pour l'arrêter. Ce n'était peut-être pas grand-chose, mais cela nous séparait diamétralement. Il était en quelque sorte seul, isolé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001820_ESTINIEN<tab>Though his shade is banished, his spirit scattered upon the Sea of Clouds, I feel no joy at his passing. Where once I craved vengeance, I now crave rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001820_ESTINIEN<tab>L'ombre de mon ennemi a disparu dans les profondeurs de la Mer de nuages. Pourtant, même après avoir assouvi ma vengeance, mon cœur ne connaît pas la paix. Je ne peux m'empêcher de regretter toutes les vies qui ont été perdues...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001830_ESTINIEN<tab>Lord Commander, my hunt is at an end. I would lay down the mantle of Azure Dragoon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001830_ESTINIEN<tab>Le temps où je traquais impitoyablement les dragons est terminé. Je renonce of<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ciel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment au titre de Dragon céleste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001840_AYMERIC<tab>My friend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001840_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001850_ABEL<tab>He has tired himself with too many words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001850_ABEL<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas. Parler autant a dû le fatiguer, mais ses jours ne sont plus en danger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001860_ABEL<tab>I doubt not that he will make a full recovery, but he must be allowed some few days of quiet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001860_ABEL<tab>Si nous le laissons se reposer, il se remettra en un rien de temps. Comptez sur moi pour prendre bien soin de lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001870_AYMERIC<tab>I too must see my path to its end. Sleep well, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001870_AYMERIC<tab>Moi aussi, j'ai une dernière chose à faire...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001880_EDMONT<tab>Following the battle with Nidhogg on the Steps of Faith,
Ser Aymeric called an assembly that he might make his final proclamation as acting head of state.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001880_EDMONT<tab>Quelque temps après la terrible bataille livrée à l'Avancée de la Foi contre l'ancien dragon Nidhogg,
messire Aymeric prit une importante décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001890_EDMONT<tab>'Twas there, with one decree, that the thousand-year rule of the archbishops was ended, paving the way for a new republic.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001890_EDMONT<tab>Mettant un terme à la longue tradition monarchique qui avait mis un archevêque à la tête d'Ishgard,
il déclara vouloir faire de la sainte Cité une république.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001900_EDMONT<tab>The governance of Ishgard would now be placed in the hands of high- and lowborn alike,
their ranks represented by the newly founded House of Lords and House of Commons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001900_EDMONT<tab>Les affaires politiques devaient être décidées par deux chambres,
l'une composée de membres de la noblesse, l'autre de re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tants du peuple.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001910_EDMONT<tab>Church was separated from state. The foundation for change had been carefully laid,
and the reforms proposed by Ishgard's new government passed into law without incident.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001910_EDMONT<tab>La transition fut accomplie sans encombre grâce à des con<var 16 /var>sul<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions préalables entre les deux constituants
de la société ishgardaise, et la séparation de l'État et de l'Église fut proclamée.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001920_EDMONT<tab>His duty done, Aymeric de Borel gladly stepped down from the archbishop's dais...
only to be raised unto the highest seat in the House of Lords.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001920_EDMONT<tab>Pour son premier président, la Chambre des Nobles choisit Aymeric de Borel, qui venait juste de démissionner
de ses fonctions de suppléant de l'Archevêque en mettant en place le régime républicain.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001930_EDMONT<tab>Though he strove at first to refuse this honor,
the unexpectedly strident voice of the Count de Durendaire left him little choice but to accept...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001930_EDMONT<tab>Et, bien qu'il eut d'abord refusé cet honneur, à la surprise de tous,
il finit par se laisser convaincre par le plaidoyer du comte de Durendaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001940_EDMONT<tab>And so it was that the winds of gentle revolution came to stir.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001940_EDMONT<tab>C'est ainsi qu'un vent de réforme commença à souffler sur la sainte Cité.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001950_EDMONT<tab>Prominent among the many honored guests at Ser Aymeric's investiture were the ambassadors of dragonkind,
a fitting symbol of Ishgard's newfound peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001950_EDMONT<tab>Beaucoup, y compris des dragons, furent conviés à la cérémonie d'investiture
de messire Aymeric, ce qui marqua dignement le début de la République d'Ishgard.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001960_EDMONT<tab>The people looked on in awe as he soared through the heavens on dragonback,
and by their cheers did they hail him an Azure Dragoon for a new age.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001960_EDMONT<tab>Par la suite, lorsqu'ils l'apercevaient voler sur le dos d'une de ces majestueuses créatures,
nombreux furent ceux qui lui donnèrent le surnom de “Dragon céleste des nouveaux temps”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001970_EDMONT<tab>Thus were the notes of the Dragonsong rewritten, the din of war giving way to a rising litany of peace and hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001970_EDMONT<tab>C'est ainsi que les derniers échos de la guerre millénaire s'estompèrent dans la Mer de nuages,
et qu'un nouveau chant de paix commença à retentir dans les cieux.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001980_SYSTEM<tab>From the memoirs of Count Edmont de Fortemps
<var 1A 02 /var>Heavensward<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03300_001980_SYSTEM<tab>- Extrait des mémoires du comte Edmont de Fortemps
Chapitre final<var 1D /var>: “Un chant pour l'avenir”
